snippet: Hurricane Sandy left the Jets with little time to relax during their bye week. Now they must refocus on their bleak playoff chances.
abstract: Hurricane Sandy leaves New York Jets with little time to regroup during their bye week; team is preparing to face Seattle Seahawks in Seattle, where Seahawks are unbeaten this season, and loss could doom Jets playoff aspirations.
lead_paragraph: Hurricane Sandy left the Jets with little time to relax during their bye week. Now they must refocus on their bleak playoff chances.

headline.seo: Hurricane Sandy Has Jets Facing Two Different Realities
headline.main: Jets Find Little Relief in Their Return After Storm
headline.print_headline: Jets Find Little Relief in Their Return to Football After Dealing With Storm
